text.__SUMMARY__: Arthrostylidium reflexum is a species of Arthrostylidium bamboo in the grass family.
text.Distribution: The species is native to South America and the Caribbean.
text.Description:
Its width is typically straight, bilateral, and reaches 0.5 cm long. It has 3 Lodicules, 3 Anthers and 2 Stigmas.
